Function# OSArrayReplaceValue

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS


## [See Also](/documentation/DriverKit/OSArrayReplaceValue#see-also)

### [Accessing Elements](/documentation/DriverKit/OSArrayReplaceValue#Accessing-Elements)

[`getObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/getobject)Returns a member of the array.[`getLastObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/getlastobject)Returns the last member of the array.[`getNextIndexOfObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/getnextindexofobject)Searches the array for an object.[`setObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/setobject-3bore)Appends an object as the last member of the array.[`setObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/setobject-4ys3x)Sets an object as the member of the array at a given index.[`iterateObjects`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/iterateobjects)Iterates the array calling a callback block for each member.[`replaceObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/replaceobject)Removes a current member of the array and replaces it with another object.[`removeObject`](/documentation/driverkit/osarray/removeobject)Removes a current member of the array.[`OSArrayAppendValue`](/documentation/driverkit/osarrayappendvalue)
